text: Jab ibrahim ney kaha aey perwerdigar! Tu iss jagah ko aman wala shehar bana aur yahan kay bashindon ko jo Allah Taalaa per aur qayamat kay din per eman rakhney walay hon phalon ki roziyan dey. Allah Taalaa ney farmaya: mein kafiron ko bhi thora faeeda doon ga phir unhen aag kay azab ki taraf bey bus ker doon ga yeh phonchney ki jagah buri hai
